scripts.version-bump: node --input-type=commonjs -e "const fs=require('fs');let h=fs.readFileSync('index.html','utf8');const m=h.match(/\\?v=(\\d+)/);if(m){const n=+m[1]+1;h=h.replace(/\\?v=\\d+/g,'?v='+n);fs.writeFileSync('index.html',h);console.log('index.html 버전 v'+m[1]+' → v'+n+' 업데이트 완료')}else{console.log('버전 패턴을 찾지 못했습니다')}"
